entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
